exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the terms "p", "a" and "t" leads to a term fun (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t0 : term) => u_conv_rec_1_r p0 a0 t0 r which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "u_conv_rec_1_r" of type "forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a0 t -> Prop" cannot be applied to the terms "p0" : "preDTA" "a0" : "ad" "t0" : "term" "r" : "reconnaissance p a t" The 4th term has type "reconnaissance p a t" which should be coercible to "reconnaissance p0 a0 t0".

original: intros p a t r. induction r. - apply u_conv1_0r with (ladj:=ladj) (e:=e). apply H. - apply u_conv_lr_1 with (la:=la) (ls:=ls). apply u_conv1_3 with (hd:=hd) (tl:=tl) (r:=r). apply H. apply IHr.
